summary: Need to make that shiny new steel sword, but already smelted all your corundum ore into ingots? No problem!
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply allows you to smelt steel ingots from any combination of corundum and iron ingots or ore! All of the recipes are balanced so that you get the same amount of steel ingots from the original raw ore inputs -- so for example a single corundum ingot (made from 2 ore) will, when smelted with 2 iron ingots or ore, yield 2 steel ingots!

The new recipes added are:
* 1 Corundum ingot + 2 Iron ingots = 2 Steel ingots
* 1 Corundum ore + 1 Iron ingot = 1 Steel ingot
* 1 Corundum ingot + 2 Iron ore = 2 Steel ingots

Note that, like at the tanning rack, these new recipes will only show up at the smelter if you have the required materials in your inventory.
author: Kromey
